title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Finding the Noisy Neighbor: Patterns for Per‑Customer Performance at Scale-MAM354
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-寻找噪声邻居：大规模按客户性能模式-MAM354
abstract: Zendesk chose Datadog for observability (APM, Log Management) to boost performance, resolve issues faster, and optimize infrastructure. Datadog's tools provided essential per-tenant visibility for their high-cardinality, multi-tenant platform, guiding code and infrastructure decisions. Datadog also helps Zendesk optimize AWS usage in real-time. This led to faster detection and resolution, fewer cross-tenant incidents, right-sized compute/storage, and better customer experience. Attendees will learn how to de-risk migrations and accelerate modernization with Datadog and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Datadog, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: Zendesk选择Datadog进行可观测性（APM、日志管理）以提升性能、更快解决问题并优化基础设施。Datadog的工具为其高基数、多租户平台提供了必要的按租户可见性，指导代码和基础设施决策。Datadog还帮助Zendesk实时优化AWS使用。这带来了更快的检测和解决、更少的跨租户事件、合理调整的计算/存储以及更好的客户体验。与会者将学习如何使用Datadog和AWS降低迁移风险并加速现代化。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Datadog提供。
